verbose_text: Immunoprecipitation studies with the anti-LKB1 farnesylation specific antibody confirmed that the normal LKB1 long isoform was immunoprecipitated, but not the LKB1 short isoform, which is not farnesylated [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR].
evidence: farnesylation-specific antibody confirmed that the normal LKB1 long  isoform was immunoprecipitated, but not the LKB1
